item.description:
We are a group of singles looking to meet new people. Online dating and meeting people with a busy lifestyle such as ours is difficult. Are you in Central, CT and want to meet fun, outgoing and optimistic people? Then join us - we'll have plenty of fun.
Feel free to give us a call on the cell at 860-614-9367 - Christie or Bryan.

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: Central, CT Single in Style Meetup
